verses.name: Joshua 5:8
verses.text: And it came to pass, when they had done circumcising all the people, that they abode in their places in the camp, till they were whole.

verses.name: Joshua 5:9
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Joshua, This day have I rolled away the reproach of Egypt from off you. Wherefore the name of the place is called Gilgal unto this day.

verses.name: Joshua 5:10
verses.text: And the children of Israel encamped in Gilgal, and kept the passover on the fourteenth day of the month at even in the plains of Jericho.
